title: Black Screen after Champion Select (Random) - RIOT PLEASE HELP
body:
Some time ago, I've been getting a black screen after the champion select. After a while of the loading, a popup comes up that says "Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and attempt to reconnect to the game." I don't know why, but after I reconnect 1/2/3/4 times, it usually works and I'm able to enter the game.
          BUT sometimes, it doesn't occur and I am able to enter a game fine. Once I was able to play 5 games in a row without the blackscreen, sometimes I'm not able to play any. I don't have it maybe a serious as others, but this is a major inconvenience to League players and is ruining the fun of this game.

I have tried stopping the IPhelper, disabling my Norton firewall, and mashing the enter/delete/space keys. I'm seriously in a tough situation as it is. Would be delighted for any help.
[RIOT, please help us]

replies.body: Inconsistent connectivity issues can point toward a few different things, typically, either a problem along your network route or an actual problem with your local network settings. To rule out the easy stuff, I'd like you to work through the steps within our [**network guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). If those steps don't end up resolving this, we can investigate further and take a look at your network routing to our servers, just let me know how those steps go.
I tried the "Configure your DNS" and Hextech repair, but I'm still getting the same problem.

Since you're still seeing issues, I suggest we escalate this to our tech specialists in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I recommend running system logs with our [**Hextech tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attaching them to the ticket you submit for quicker service.

Let me know if you have any questions.
